title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce platform with advanced filtering, shopping cart, and checkout functionality. Built with React, TypeScript, and integrated with Stripe for payments.
contributions: Implemented product filtering and search functionality
results: Increased conversion rate by 35% and reduced cart abandonment by 20%

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
contributions: Created responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: Personal Blog Platform
description: A minimalist blog platform with markdown support, syntax highlighting, and SEO optimization. Features a clean reading experience and author dashboard.
contributions: Built static site generation for optimal performance
Implemented markdown editor with live preview

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and historical weather data visualization.
